      • safeItemGive

        public static void safeItemGive(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Safely gives a player an item by either adding it to their inventory or if full, dropping it on the ground
        Parameters:
        player - the player to give the item to
        item - the item given to the player

      • safePotionApply

        public static void safePotionApply(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                   org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffect potion)
        Attempts to apply a potion effect to a player 1. If the player does not have the effect, it will be applied 2. If the player already has the potion there are three scenarios 2a. If the potion attempting to be applied has a higher amplifier than the current effect, it will be overridden 2b. If the potion amplifiers are equal but the incoming potion has a longer duration it will be overridden 2c. If the incoming potion effect does not have an amplifier or duration advantage over the current effect it will be ignored
        Parameters:
        player - player
        potion - potion effect

      • removePotionEffects

        Parameters:

        potions - potion effects
